snippet: Readers respond to recent reviews of “Doomed to Succeed: The U.S.-Israel Relationship From Truman to Obama,” Ben Bernanke’s “The Courage to Act” and more.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to recent reviews of “Doomed to Succeed: The U.S.-Israel Relationship From Truman to Obama,” Ben Bernanke’s “The Courage to Act” and more.
